basics.name: Carlos Barroso
basics.label: Chief IA Officer & AWS Community Builder & AWS Group Leader
basics.summary:
Currently MLOps Architect at Teracloud (https://www.teracloud.io/services-machine-learning-mlops)
Architected, managed and reviewed a broad range of projects. In the last couple of years mostly solutions involving machine learning in the Fintech and e-commerce markets.
Progressed through the positions of programmer, team leader, project manager and operations manager, I've managed large projects in the US and later a whole Operations division.
Now I help companies to find the best solution to fulfill their organizational goals using people + data, while I design next-gen AI products for Teracloud.io

I have experience in this industries:
- Aerospatial
- Finances
- E-commerce
- Bitcoin and blockchain

Keywords: Technical sales, fintech, ecommerce, machine learning, data science, project management

Bassist of @afterofficemusic (https://www.instagram.com/afterofficemusic/)

work.name: Teracloud.io
work.summary: As Head of AI, my job is to ideate, validate, create and grow AI and ML related products for AIOps and robotic process automation. Teracloud.io is a young company created by seasoned practitioners of DevOps and cloud. My ultimate goal is to help people from every industry to harness the opportunities that AI&ML creates without investing in long and costly trial-and-error development processes.

work.name: Teracloud
work.summary: Design, architect and implement MLOps infrastructure for machine/deep learning and artificial intelligence workloads. My goal is to lower costs and speed up the time to market of ML initiatives of our customers by implementing secure and robust infrastructure pipelines.

work.name: Machinalis
work.summary:
Head of the Machine Learning Solutions Architecture.
My responsibilities include:
* Finding new market verticals to conquer, and design the attack strategy using our technical strengths.
* Lead the Customer Decision Journey process, from the first contact to the successful delivery of a business proposal.
* Leading the Business Analysis teams and our Customer, to design the Best Solution for their current and future problems and opportunities.
* Work with current customers to find new, innovative ways to understand their business and marketing to find opportunities to grow together.
* Negotiating boring contract details.

work.name: Machinalis
work.summary: Agile project management of a medium sized aerospatial MRP

work.name: Starbene
work.summary:
The job is to define and maintain processes in conformation with many ISO, IEC and FDA norms and regulations, like:

- ISO 9001
- IEC 60601, Medical electrical equipment
- IEC 13485, Medical Devices - Quality management
- IEC 62304 Medical Device Software - Software Life-cycle processes
- ISO/IEC 14598 Software Product Evaluation
- FDA General Principles of Software Validation

references.name: Julio Guillermo ACHAVAL
references.reference: Respalda a sus compañeros de trabajo aportando soluciones a su alcance aunque le lleve realizar investigaciones y no sean de su inmediata responsabilidad. Aporta con sentido común al beneficio general de la Organización

references.name: Claudia Calles
references.reference: Carlos es muy analítico y creativo. Está constantemente investigando para conseguir los mejores resultados.  Es un profesional orientado perfección y a la mejora continua. Es una persona en constante búsqueda de la superación, lo cual lo convierte en un talento excepcional. Su gran calidez humana hace de él un gran compañero de trabajo.

references.name: Damian Antonio Gitto Olguin
references.reference:
La gestión de Carlos en Su puesto de Software Project Leader, realmente es impecable, la Gestión de proceso de desarrollo, su capacidad analitica, de planificación y visión, ha llevado a un status de Word Class Software a los desarrollado de software en nuestra Empresa.
Su Capacidad de Mejora continua lo lleva a una constante evolución y mejora de las tecologias y procesos aplicados en sus Area a cargo.

references.name: Marcelo Alaniz
references.reference:
Carlos ha sido un excelente desarrollador. Tiene la capacidad de ver mas alla del común de la gente. Es una persona obsesionada por la perfección, lo cual compartimos. 
Cuando trabajamos en algunos proyectos personales, aprendi mucho de el y su trato con el cliente. De su humor para siempre estar contento por nuevos desafíos...
